We provide a helper method which aims to make plotting indicators simple. For further information on the charting API please see our Charting section.

private RelativeDailyVolume _rdv;
// In Initialize()
_rdv = RDV(symbol);

// In OnData()
if (_rdv.IsReady)
{
    Plot("My Indicators", "RDV Is Ready", _rdv.IsReady);
    Plot("My Indicators", "RDV Warm Up Period", _rdv.WarmUpPeriod);
    Plot("My Indicators", "RDV Current", _rdv.Current);
    Plot("My Indicators", "RDV Name", _rdv.Name);
    Plot("My Indicators", "RDV Samples", _rdv.Samples);
}
# In Initialize()
self.rdv = self.RDV(symbol)

# In OnData()
if self.rdv.IsReady:
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "RDV Is Ready", self.rdv.IsReady);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "RDV Warm Up Period", self.rdv.WarmUpPeriod);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "RDV Current", self.rdv.Current);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "RDV Name", self.rdv.Name);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "RDV Samples", self.rdv.Samples);
}
